result.eng: The lights are on but there is nobody home.
result.ga: tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaile
result.orig: tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaile
result.html: tá na soilse lasta ach níl aon dhuine sa bhaileThe lights are on but there is nobody home.
result.ponchtml: tá na soilse lasta aċ níl aon ḋuine sa ḃaileThe lights are on but there is nobody home.

result.eng: She flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
result.ga: chas sí an lasc thuisleach las na soilse an athuair
result.orig: chas sí an lasc thuisleach las na soilse an athuair
result.html: chas sí an lasc thuisleach las na soilse an athuairShe flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
result.ponchtml: ċas sí an lasc ṫuisleaċ las na soilse an aṫuairShe flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.

result.eng: Bright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ga: solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.orig: solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agat
result.html: solais loinnireacha gheala a bhainfeadh an t-amharc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.
result.ponchtml: solais loinnireaċa ġeala a ḃainfeaḋ an t-aṁarc as an tsúil agatBright shining lights that would blinden you.

result.eng: The streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ga: bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
